longDescription:
- Emerald, ivory and black leather
- Snap fastenings through front
- 80% leather (Lamb), 19% polyester, 1% elastane
- Specialist clean
name: Oversized leather bomber jacket
sizeFit:
- Fits true to size, take your normal size 
- Oversized style, cut to be worn loose 
- Supple, non-stretchy leather 
- Those with a petite frame may wish to take the next size down
- Model is 177cm/ 5'10" and is wearing an IT size 40
editorsComments:
Marni made classic sporty silhouettes feel luxurious with its Spring '15 collection. Seen on the runway, this oversized bomber jacket is flawlessly cut from smooth leather and defined by ribbed trims at the hem, cuffs and neckline. Team yours with culottes and sandals.
